entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
